PICOs.Population: People who have previously had platinum-doublet chemotherapy
PICOs.Intervention: Sotorasib (960 mg once a day until disease progression, treatment discontinuation or the end of the study)
PICOs.Comparator: Docetaxel monotherapy and docetaxel plus nintedanib
PICOs.Outcomes: Objective response rate of 37.1% (95% confidence interval 28.6 to 46.2)

PICOs.Population: People with advanced cancer after platinum-based chemotherapy
PICOs.Outcomes: Clinical effectiveness and cost-effectiveness, with ongoing data collection to resolve uncertainties
